thread.title: Aloe Blacc and Wife Expecting Baby Number Two
thread.title_full: Aloe Blacc and Wife Expecting Baby Number Two

title: Aloe Blacc and Wife Expecting Baby Number Two
text:
Aloe Blacc and Wife Expecting Baby Number Two Posted today at 2:30pm 
Reid Rolls/XIX Recordings/Interscope Records (LOS ANGELES) -- Aloe Blacc is going to be a dad again. The singer and his wife, Maya Jupiter, are expecting their second child together, E! News confirms. 
The couple attended the 44th annual Peace Over Violence Humanitarian Awards in Los Angeles on Friday, and Maya’s large baby bump was on full display. 
Aloe, whose birth name is Egbert Nathaniel Dawkins III, and Maya, an Australian rapper whose birth name is Melissha Martinez, married in 2010. Their first child, a daughter named Mandela, is two years old.
